Package pfriendly

Class UpOgl

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PImage
      • processing.core.PGraphics
        • processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
          • pfriendly.UpOgl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IUp, IUpOgl, processing.core.PConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Up3, Yup2
    public abstract class UpOgl
extends processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
implements IUpOgl
    An abstract parent class for Processing renderers based on OpenGL.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface pfriendly.IUpOgl

        IUpOgl.Sampling

                 float y2,
                 float r)
        Draws a rounded rectangle. The meaning of the first four parameters depends on rectMode.
        Overrides:
        rect in class processing.core.PGraphics
        Parameters:
        x1 - the first x parameter
        y1 - the first y parameter
        x2 - the second x parameter
        y2 - the second y parameter
        r - the corner rounding

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int width,
                    int height)
        Set size is the last function called by size, createGraphics, makeGraphics, etc. when initializing the graphics renderer. Therefore, any additional values that need initialization can be attempted here.
        Overrides:
        setSize in class processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
        Parameters:
        width - the applet width
        height - the applet height
